pack.xdsl.VoIPLineOrder.description: Represents an order of VoIP lines

diameter.description: The diameter of this section in millimeters

warnings.description: The special condition(s) of the portability

type.description: Type of the service to delete

uiCode.description: An opaque string that represents an intervention unit
